a.n: Thomas & Friends: Big World! Big Adventures! XXIII (4)

p.k: Thomas is working on the Brazilian Railway when he meets Gustavo, a big, blue engine who reminds him of Gordon! So when Gustavo offers Thomas some advice, Thomas takes it the wrong way and thinks that Gustavo is trying to boss him around! But because he doesn't listen to Gustavo's friendly words, he soon runs into trouble!
